title: Motion of ball rolling without slipping down ramp

content.prompt: A ball, rolling without slipping on a horizontal surface, encounters a frictionless, downwardsloping ramp, as shown above. Which of the following correctly describes the motion of the ball on the ramp?

choices.label: Constant translational speed with no angular speed
Increasing translational speed with no angular speed
Increasing translational speed with constant nonzero angular speed
Increasing translational speed with decreasing angular speed
Increasing translational speed with increasing angular speed

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
